Job Description: As an SDE I at Morgan Stanley, you will work on designing, developing, and maintaining scalable software solutions under the guidance of senior engineers. This is a great opportunity for recent graduates or junior engineers to work on meaningful projects while learning from industry experts. Responsibilities include writing clean, efficient code, collaborating with cross-functional teams, and participating in code reviews. Required qualifications include a Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field, 0–2 years of experience, and basic knowledge of programming languages and software engineering principles.

As an SDE III at Morgan Stanley, you will be a key contributor to the design, architecture, and implementation of highly scalable and secure technology solutions. You will lead development initiatives, mentor junior engineers, and collaborate across teams to support the firm’s strategic goals. Responsibilities include designing enterprise software, driving technical innovation, ensuring code quality, and resolving production issues. Required qualifications include 6+ years of experience, expertise in one or more major languages, strong system design skills, and familiarity with cloud platforms, CI/CD, and distributed systems.
